body:
So today is Easter Monday and I had the day off of school and i got board and looked back on avicus. I was doing some research and found some interesting facts for all you new players. THIS is all what i have seen on google and stuff so don't trust me on everything

  • KyloCode formally known as IvyCode had a survival Server called Terrascape
  • Then  Haribo98 (ParaPenguin) came along and made the nebula plugin as we know.
  • McZone Came along and was a great hit, there were lots of people on each day.
  • McZone came out with the Avicore plugin give or take 2 years ago and that all started avicus.
Fun Facts
  • ParaPenguin doesn't play avicus anymore but played ocn 12 days ago
  • http://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/servers/pc-servers/objective-servers/767580-project-nebula-tdm-... is the post were ParaPenguin posted the plugin
  • http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/nexus-bernatixer/ other people recreated the plugin? what news 
  • https://bukkit.org/threads/plugin-to-create-nebula-and-join-signs.277900/ whats to directly recreate the plugin 
This is all some random things i pulled up and i will continue editing it when i research more :D 
Please Lock this if it is against the rules or something
